Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your needs and expectations. This product has been meticulously designed to provide exceptional value and functionality. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer of $150 to you. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this item at this special price. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
